title: Metaverse-Based Immersive Science Inquiry Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Three or more years of science teaching experience or foundational knowledge in secondary science education
context.additional_context: Process where current secondary science teachers practice designing effective inquiry-based lessons in metaverse environments. Includes project execution based on actual science curricula and feedback provision

learning_goals: Design three types of science inquiry activities using 3D virtual environments in a metaverse platform.
Implement scientific problem-solving processes by applying collaborative tools among learners (virtual whiteboards, joint simulations, etc.).
Analyze the effectiveness of metaverse education design through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
